name: Purchase Report by Type
query:
SELECT pi.name AS "Purchase Invoice:Link/Purchase Invoice:150",
        s.name                      AS "SUPPLIER_NAME:Link/Supplier:250",
        s.vrn                       AS "SUPPLIER_VRN::100", 
        pi.bill_no                  AS "TAX_INVOICE_NUMBER::100", 
        pi.posting_date             AS "DATE_OF_INVOICE:Date:120", 
        GROUP_CONCAT(pii.item_name) AS "ITEMS::250", 
        pi.base_net_total           AS "AMOUNT_VAT_EXCL:Currency:150", 
        pi.base_total_taxes_and_charges  AS "VAT_AMT:Currency:100",
        IF(pi.base_rounded_total > 0, pi.base_rounded_total, pi.base_grand_total) AS "AMOUNT_VAT_INCL:Currency:150"
FROM   `tabPurchase Invoice` pi 
        INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
            ON pii.parent = pi.name
       INNER JOIN `tabSupplier` s 
               ON pi.supplier = s.name 
WHERE  ((pi.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and pi.posting_date <= %(to_date)s))
   and pi.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY s.name, s.vrn, pi.bill_no, pi.bill_date, pi.base_net_total, pi.total_taxes_and_charges
ORDER BY pi.posting_date
